name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Islip MacArthur Airport

reviews.title: Excellent Staff
reviews.text: This hotel is what one would expect from a good traveller's hotel. It is new, clean rooms, fantastic tvs (flat screen HD), good beds.

The one thing which blew me away was how helpful the staff were. They have shuttle service that was willing to take us to dinner, a customer meeting and the train station to NYC. Staff behind the desk were personable and lovely.
reviews.title: greta hotle

reviews.text: All around a hotel I would highly recommend.
reviews.title: Fantastic Find!

likes.liked: — its new, clean & nearby local airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great hotel. Immaculate rooms and bathrooms, great flatscreen tv's..complimentary breakfast. Elevators scattered throught out so you never have walk far to find one..its almost as if you have your own personal one. Staff very helpful..my refrigerator was not cold enough they replaced it in 5 minutes. Checked in early and room was not ready so they upgraded me and gave me one instantly. Highly recommend this.
reviews.title: Beautiful rooms AND Pet Friendly...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This fairly new hotel is a wonderful place to stay if you are in Long Island. They provide shuttle service to the Islip/McArthur airport which is only 2 minutes away. Reasonably priced with decent breakfast. Good size clean rooms with comfy pillows, crisp sheets & flat screen TV. Free parking and you can also request to be shuttled & picked-up to & from the nearest train station (Ronkonkoma).
reviews.title: good location in the area of Bohemia, NY (Long Island)

reviews.text: Stayed at this new hotel for an extended business trip. It's excellent value compared with other choices in the area; very clean, with friendly staff. As a bonus, each room has a fridge & microwave, which you may find helpful as good local restaurants seem to offer portions suitable for 2 or more regular meals! There's a small gym and a whirlpool to help work out those extra Calories.
reviews.title: Friendly, great value, new La Quinta

reviews.text: It's convenient for Long Island Islip airport., and also Long Island RailRoad's Ronkonkoma station. The latter is great for visiting Manhattan (Penn Station, $9.50 & 1hr20min each way on a comfortable train, see www.lirr.org). La Quinta offers a free shuttle to teh airport & station.
reviews.title: Loved it!!!!

reviews.text: I went to Long Island for a Friday through Monday visit in November. All the hotels I have stayed at in the past in Suffolk County have been way overpriced, especially since most of them are sort of run down and the customer service has been lacking (my opinion only).
reviews.title: Absolutely top notch for the area

reviews.text: this is a great hotel for the business traveler or family. great location and very attractive hotel inside and out. no pool but nice jazuzzi and weight room. i believe they even take pets. rooms very clean and have all the necessities including mico and fridge and safe in rooms. breakfast was above average. although so close to the airport, couldnt hear any planes and this was the weekend of 4th of july. close to many fine restaurants and diners and 24 hr eateries. would definitely stay again and would definitely recommend to all.
reviews.title: wonderful hotel

likes.liked: — the comfort and conveniences of the room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is perfectly clean, luxuriously appointed, and staffed with courteous folks. The beds were clean and plush with new white linens, the carpets thick and fresh. The wide-panel flat-screen TV actually made me gasp, but the cheeriest surprises were the microwave and fridge hidden in the cabinet beneath it.
reviews.title: Hello, Flat-Screen TV.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Don't let the address, "Aero Road," sway you--it is indeed near the Islip Airport, but you won't hear any planes or traffic. It is set off the main thorougfare (between Veterans Memorial and Sunrise Hwys) in a quiet, safe location. Plenty of restaurants nearby, including a Panera Bread and TGIF. Ocean beaches are just a few miles away off of the Southern State Parkway.
reviews.title: Couldn't ask for better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There's an exceptional business center, and breakfast was a delight; they actually had two attendants making sure everything was full and fresh. Plenty of fruit and a fun make-your-own waffle station. There is no pool, but the 12-person jacuzzi fits the bill. And speaking of that, it's a small price to pay for what you get. This hotel, seriously, could be a vacation in itself. We'll be back.
reviews.title: Clean and neat, Love it very much

likes.liked: — Flat TV, Quietness, Cheap rate, free transportation
likes.disliked: — Far away from everything, small gym/pool.

reviews.text: We stayed here after a late night flight into Long Island and everything was GREAT! The shuttle picked us up from the airport and brought us to the Long Island Railroad Station the next morning on our way to NYC. It was very clean, the help was friendly, and I would stay again, no questions asked.
reviews.title: Great for Buisness Travelers

aka: La Quinta Inn & Suites Islip/Macarthur Airport Hotel Bohemia
